name: First Game - Circle Evasion (Proof of Concept)
name_original: First Game - Circle Evasion (Proof of Concept)
description:
Just a simple dodging game with a timer. How long can you last?

This is less a game and more a proof of concept. While its appearance is very rough, it is the product of my first adventure into game creation.

In the future, I may update the appearance... but for now this is the first fully functional build. I hope you enjoy it, even if it doesn't have much complexity!
